## Importation

Import the required libraries.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(xts)
library(highfrequency)
```

## Data Pre-Processing

Load and pre-process the TAQ data.

```{r}
# Write file path for data.
file_path <- 'amzn_tick_history_01_04_2023.csv'

# Read in TAQ data.
data <- read.csv(file_path)
```
